languages.text: [Сделать строгое лицо] "Махарий, тебе стоит поговорить с супругой о том, что прилично в высшем обществе, а что — нет".
[Look stern] "Macharius, you should talk to your spouse about what passes for decent conduct in high society and what does not."
languages.original_text: [Сделать строгое лицо] "Махарий, тебе стоит поговорить с супругой о том, что прилично в высшем обществе, а что — нет".

traits.locale_text: [Make a stern face] "Macharius, you should talk to your spouse about what is decent in high society and what is not."
[Make a stern face] "Macharius, you should talk to your spouse about what is decent in high society and what is not."
[Make a stern face] "Macharius, you should talk to your spouse about what is decent in high society and what is not."
[Look stern] "Macharius, you should talk to your spouse about what passes for decent conduct in high society and what does not."
[Look stern] "Macharius, you should talk to your spouse about what passes for decent conduct in high society and what does not."

languages.text: [Prendre un air sévère] « Macharius, vous devriez expliquer à votre épouse la différence entre ce qui est acceptable dans la haute société et ce qui ne l'est pas. »
languages.original_text: [Look stern] "Macharius, you should talk to your spouse about what passes for decent conduct in high society and what does not."

traits.locale_text: [Prendre un air sévère] « Macharius, vous devriez expliquer à votre épouse la différence entre ce qui est acceptable dans la haute société et ce qui ne l'est pas. »

languages.text: [板起脸]“马卡里乌斯，你应该和你的配偶好好聊聊，在上层社会，什么是体面，什么是羞耻。”
languages.original_text: [Look stern] "Macharius, you should talk to your spouse about what passes for decent conduct in high society and what does not."

traits.locale_text: [板起脸]“马卡里乌斯，你应该和你的配偶好好聊聊，在上层社会，什么是体面，什么是羞耻。”

languages.text: [Streng schauen] "Macharius, Ihr solltet mit Eurer besseren Hälfte darüber sprechen, was sich in hoher Gesellschaft geziemt und was nicht."
languages.original_text: [Look stern] "Macharius, you should talk to your spouse about what passes for decent conduct in high society and what does not."

traits.locale_text: [Ein strenges Gesicht machen] "Macharius, Ihr solltet mit Eurer besseren Hälfte darüber sprechen, was sich in hoher Gesellschaft geziemt und was nicht."

languages.text: [Mostrar una expresión seria] «Macharius, hable con su esposa sobre qué se considera comportarse con decencia entre la alta sociedad».
languages.original_text: [Look stern] "Macharius, you should talk to your spouse about what passes for decent conduct in high society and what does not."

traits.locale_text: [Mostrar una expresión seria] «Macharius, hable con su esposa sobre cómo comportarse con decencia entre la alta sociedad».

languages.text: [顔を強張らせる]「マハリウス、上流社会での礼儀作法として何が適切で、何がそうでないかについて、配偶者に話しておいた方がいい」
languages.original_text: [Look stern] "Macharius, you should talk to your spouse about what passes for decent conduct in high society and what does not."

traits.locale_text: [顔を強張らせる]「マハリウス、上流社会での礼儀作法として何が適切で、何がそうでないかについて、配偶者に話しておいた方がいい」

languages.text: [Haşin bir bakış at] "Macharius, iyisi mi eşinle yüksek sosyetede nasıl davranılacağını bir konuşuver."
languages.original_text: [Look stern] "Macharius, you should talk to your spouse about what passes for decent conduct in high society and what does not."

traits.locale_text: [Haşin bir bakış at] "Macharius, en iyisi eşinle yüksek sosyetede nasıl davranılacağını bir konuşmanı öneririm."
